mapper.insert: insert into commodity_price_adjust (commodity_price_adjust_id, adjust_create_date, adjust_create_employee_code, adjust_create_employee_name, adjust_status, adjust_effective_date, adjust_remark) values (#{commodity_price_adjust_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adjust_create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adjust_create_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjust_create_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjust_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adjust_effective_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adjust_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update commodity_price_adjust set adjust_create_date = #{adjust_create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adjust_create_employee_code = #{adjust_create_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adjust_create_employee_name = #{adjust_create_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adjust_status = #{adjust_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adjust_effective_date = #{adjust_effective_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adjust_remark = #{adjust_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where commodity_price_adjust_id = #{commodity_price_adjust_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select commodity_price_adjust_id, adjust_create_date, adjust_create_employee_code, adjust_create_employee_name, adjust_status, adjust_effective_date, adjust_remark from commodity_price_adjust where commodity_price_adjust_id = #{commodity_price_adjust_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
